replies.bodyText:
Initially, the reason was  because proto.lock file, if any breaking changes, it will fail to compile. I have removed this, as anyway HA is part of this release, and we can remove this field.
cc @avijayanhwx
replies.author: bharatviswa504

replies.bodyText: The general guideline is breaking API changes are allowed pre-GA, but not after that.
replies.author: avijayanhwx

timeline.message: HDDS-3685. Remove replay logic from actual request logic.
